myAbout.name: Thien Thuan Nguyen
myAbout.bio: A highly motivated, results-drive software engineer with many years experience, who is constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques. I am very passionate about Software Development, and strive to better myself as a developer, and the development community as a whole.

description.name: Designed and debugged desktop application in C#/WPF with MVVM, MVCVM, and SOLID Principle.
Designed and implemented highly interactive Windows-based GUI for application setup & part inspection using XAML.
Integrate the existing math and image processing library for point fitting in order to calculate distance between geometries such as point-line distance.
Agile software development process with Scrum.
